query.sql: --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) SELECT USERNAME , CREATED , ACCOUNT_STATUS , LOCK_DATE , EXPIRY_DATE , DEFAULT_TABLESPACE , TEMPORARY_TABLESPACE , PROFILE , INITIAL_RSRC_CONSUMER_GROUP , EXTERNAL_NAME , PASSWORD_VERSIONS FROM SYS.dba_users WHERE account_status LIKE '%OPEN%' and username not in ( 'APEX_030200' , 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' , 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' , 'SYSMAN' , 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' ) ORDER BY username , EXPIRY_DATE , LOCK_DATE

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) SELECT USERNAME , CREATED , ACCOUNT_STATUS , LOCK_DATE , EXPIRY_DATE , DEFAULT_TABLESPACE , TEMPORARY_TABLESPACE , PROFILE , INITIAL_RSRC_CONSUMER_GROUP , EXTERNAL_NAME , PASSWORD_VERSIONS , AUTHENTICATION_TYPE , LAST_LOGIN , ORACLE_MAINTAINED FROM SYS.dba_users WHERE account_status LIKE '%OPEN%' and username not in ( 'APEX_030200' , 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' , 'FLOWS_FILES' --, 'HR' , 'MDSYS' --, 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'SCOTT' --, 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' , 'SYSMAN' , 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' ---- 12c ---- , 'AUDSYS' , 'DBSFWUSER' , 'GSMADMIN_INTERNAL' , 'REMOTE_SCHEDULER_AGENT' ) ORDER BY username , EXPIRY_DATE , LOCK_DATE
--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select GRANTEE , GRANTED_ROLE , ADMIN_OPTION , DEFAULT_ROLE from dba_role_privs where grantee = :USERNAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) /* DO NOT DELETE EVEN IF IT IS COMMENTED select 'GRANT '||GRANTED_ROLE||' to '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then 'WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "ROLE PRIVILEGES" from dba_role_privs where GRANTEE = :USERNAME order by GRANTED_ROLE */
select 'GRANT '|| listagg(GRANTED_ROLE, ', ') within group (order by grantee, GRANTED_ROLE) || ' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "ROLE PRIVILEGES" , 'REVOKE '||listagg(GRANTED_ROLE, ', ') within group (order by grantee, GRANTED_ROLE) || ' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from dba_role_privs where GRANTEE = :USERNAME group by GRANTEE , ADMIN_OPTION order by GRANTEE /* select 'GRANT'|| SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(GRANTED_ROLE, ', '),2)|| ' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "ROLE PRIVILEGES" , 'REVOKE'||SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(GRANTED_ROLE, ', '),2)|| ' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from ( select GRANTEE , GRANTED_ROLE , ADMIN_OPTION , count(*) over (partition by GRANTEE) cnt , row_number () over (partition by GRANTEE order by grantee, GRANTED_ROLE) seq from dba_role_privs where GRANTEE = :USERNAME ) where seq = cnt start with seq = 1 connect by prior seq+1 = seq and prior GRANTEE = GRANTEE order by GRANTEE , GRANTED_ROLE */

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select GRANTEE , PRIVILEGE , ADMIN_OPTION --, DEFAULT_ROLE from dba_SYS_privs where grantee = :USERNAME order by GRANTEE , PRIVILEGE
/* select 'GRANT '||PRIVILEGE||' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "SYSTEM PRIVILEGES" , 'REVOKE '||PRIVILEGE||' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from dba_sys_privs where GRANTEE in (select GRANTEE from dba_role_privs where grantee = :USERNAME and DEFAULT_ROLE = 'YES') */

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select 'GRANT '|| listagg(PRIVILEGE, ', ') within group (order by grantee, PRIVILEGE) || ' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "ROLE PRIVILEGES" , 'REVOKE '||listagg(PRIVILEGE, ', ') within group (order by grantee, PRIVILEGE) || ' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from dba_sys_privs --GRANTEE = :USERNAME where GRANTEE in ( select GRANTEE from dba_role_privs where grantee = :USERNAME and DEFAULT_ROLE = 'YES' ) group by GRANTEE , ADMIN_OPTION order by GRANTEE /* select 'GRANT '||PRIVILEGE||' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "SYSTEM PRIVILEGES" , 'REVOKE '||PRIVILEGE||' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from dba_sys_privs where GRANTEE in (select GRANTEE from dba_role_privs where grantee = :USERNAME and DEFAULT_ROLE = 'YES') */

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select OWNER , TABLE_NAME , PRIVILEGE from dba_tab_privs where grantee = :USERNAME AND TABLE_NAME NOT LIKE 'BIN$%' order by OWNER , TABLE_NAME , PRIVILEGE

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select 'GRANT'|| SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(PRIVILEGE, ', '),2) ||' ON '||OWNER||'.'||TABLE_NAME||' TO '||GRANTEE||';' "TABLE GRANTS" , 'REVOKE'|| SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(PRIVILEGE, ', '),2) ||' ON '||OWNER||'.'||TABLE_NAME||' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from ( select GRANTEE , OWNER , TABLE_NAME , PRIVILEGE , count(*) over (partition by TABLE_NAME) cnt , row_number () over (partition by GRANTEE, TABLE_NAME order by GRANTEE, TABLE_NAME, privilege) seq from dba_tab_privs where grantee = :USERNAME AND TABLE_NAME NOT LIKE 'BIN$%' order by OWNER , TABLE_NAME , PRIVILEGE) where seq = cnt start with seq = 1 connect by prior seq+1 = seq and prior TABLE_NAME = TABLE_NAME order by grantee , privilege

-- Below code can be used with Oracle Database Rlease 11gR2 and before (need to test with 10g/9i) select 'GRANT '|| SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(PRIVILEGE, ', '),2) ||' ON '||OWNER||'.'||TABLE_NAME||' TO '||GRANTEE||';' "TABLE GRANTS" , 'REOKE '|| SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(PRIVILEGE, ', '),2) ||' ON '||OWNER||'.'||TABLE_NAME||' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from ( select GRANTEE , OWNER , TABLE_NAME , PRIVILEGE , count(*) over (partition by GRANTEE, TABLE_NAME) cnt , row_number () over (partition by GRANTEE, TABLE_NAME order by GRANTEE, TABLE_NAME, privilege) seq from dba_tab_privs where OWNER = :USERNAME order by OWNER , TABLE_NAME , PRIVILEGE) where seq = cnt start with seq = 1 connect by prior seq+1 = seq and prior TABLE_NAME = TABLE_NAME AND GRANTEE = GRANTEE order by PRIVILEGE , TABLE_NAME , GRANTEE /* -- LISTAGG analytical function works only with Oracle 11gR2 and later. select 'GRANT '|| listagg(PRIVILEGE, ', ') within group (order by OWNER, TABLE_NAME, GRANTEE) ||' ON '||OWNER||'.'||TABLE_NAME||' TO '||GRANTEE||';' "TABLE GRANTS" , 'REVOKE '|| listagg(PRIVILEGE, ', ') within group (order by OWNER, TABLE_NAME, GRANTEE) ||' ON '||OWNER||'.'||TABLE_NAME||' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from dba_tab_privs where OWNER = :USERNAME group by OWNER , TABLE_NAME , GRANTEE order by OWNER , TABLE_NAME , GRANTEE */

-- LISTAGG analytical function works only with Oracle 11gR2 and later. select 'GRANT '|| listagg(PRIVILEGE, ', ') within group (order by OWNER, TABLE_NAME, GRANTEE) ||' ON '||OWNER||'.'||TABLE_NAME||' TO '||GRANTEE||';' "TABLE GRANTS" , 'REVOKE '|| listagg(PRIVILEGE, ', ') within group (order by OWNER, TABLE_NAME, GRANTEE) ||' ON '||OWNER||'.'||TABLE_NAME||' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from dba_tab_privs where OWNER = :USERNAME group by OWNER , TABLE_NAME , GRANTEE order by OWNER , TABLE_NAME , GRANTEE

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select 'ALTER USER '||:USERNAME||' PASSWORD EXPIRE;'"ALTER USER" from dual union select 'ALTER USER '||:USERNAME||' ACCOUNT LOCK;' from dual union select 'ALTER USER '||:USERNAME||' ACCOUNT UNLOCK;' from dual union select 'ALTER USER '||:USERNAME||' IDENTIFIED BY PASSWORD;' from dual union select 'ALTER USER '||:USERNAME||' ACCOUNT LOCK PASSWORD EXPIRE;' from dual union select 'ALTER USER '||:USERNAME||' QUOTA 5G ON USERS;' from dual union select 'GRANT ALTER ON '||:USERNAME||'.'||'<TABLE_NAME> TO '||:USERNAME||';' from dual

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select TABLESPACE_NAME , USERNAME , BYTES , MAX_BYTES , BLOCKS , MAX_BLOCKS , DROPPED from DBA_TS_QUOTAS where USERNAME = :USERNAME order by TABLESPACE_NAME
--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select DBMS_METADATA.GET_DDL('USER', :USERNAME)||';'||chr(13)||chr(10) "DDL_" from dual

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select case when OBJECT_TYPE = 'TABLE' then 'DROP '|| OBJECT_TYPE||' '||OWNER||'.'||OBJECT_NAME||' CASCADE CONSTRAINTS PURGE;' when OBJECT_TYPE = 'JAVA CLASS' or OBJECT_TYPE = 'JAVA RESOURCE' or OBJECT_TYPE = 'JAVA SOURCE' then 'DROP '|| OBJECT_TYPE||' '||OWNER||'.'||'"'||OBJECT_NAME||'";' when OBJECT_TYPE = 'TYPE' then 'DROP '|| OBJECT_TYPE||' '||OWNER||'.'||OBJECT_NAME||' FORCE;' when OBJECT_TYPE = 'JOB' then 'EXECUTE DBMS_SCHEDULER.DROP_JOB('||''''||OBJECT_NAME||''''||');' when OBJECT_TYPE = 'JOB CLASS' then 'EXECUTE DBMS_SCHEDULER.DROP_JOB_CLASS('||''''||OBJECT_NAME||''''||');' else 'DROP '|| OBJECT_TYPE||' '||OWNER||'.'||OBJECT_NAME||';' end "DDL" FROM DBA_OBJECTS WHERE --object_type = :OBJECT_TYPE and OWNER IN (:USERNAME) and object_type not in ( 'PACKAGE BODY' , 'LOB' --, 'JOB' , 'INDEX' , 'INDEX PARTITION' , 'TABLE PARTITION' , 'TRIGGER' ) order by owner , object_type

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) with tabseg as ( select s.owner , s.SEGMENT_TYPE , s.SEGMENT_NAME --, t.TABLE_NAME , t.logging , s.tablespace_name , t.LAST_ANALYZED , CASE WHEN t.NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM9000.00') || ' T' WHEN t.NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM9000.00') || ' B' WHEN t.NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000),2),'FM9000.00') || ' M' WHEN t.NUM_ROWS >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.NUM_ROWS/1000,2),'FM9000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(t.NUM_ROWS,'FM9000') || ' ' END NUM_ROWS , CASE WHEN t.sample_size >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.sample_size/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM9000.00') || ' T' WHEN t.sample_size >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.sample_size/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM9000.00') || ' B' WHEN t.sample_size >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.sample_size/(1000*1000),2),'FM9000.00') || ' M' WHEN t.sample_size >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.sample_size/1000,2),'FM9000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(t.sample_size,'FM9000') || ' ' END SAMPLE_SIZE --, t.AVG_ROW_LEN , CASE WHEN t.INITIAL_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.INITIAL_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN t.INITIAL_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.INITIAL_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN t.INITIAL_EXTENT >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.INITIAL_EXTENT/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN t.INITIAL_EXTENT >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.INITIAL_EXTENT/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(t.INITIAL_EXTENT,'FM9000') || ' ' END INITIAL_EXTENT , CASE WHEN t.NEXT_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.NEXT_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN t.NEXT_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.NEXT_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN t.NEXT_EXTENT >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.NEXT_EXTENT/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN t.NEXT_EXTENT >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.NEXT_EXTENT/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(t.NEXT_EXTENT,'FM9000') || ' ' END NEXT_EXTENT , t.blocks "BLOCKS USED" , s.EXTENTS , CASE WHEN s.BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' PB' WHEN s.BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN s.BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN s.BYTES >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN s.BYTES >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(s.BYTES,'FM9000') || ' ' END BYTES --, s.blocks "BLOCKS ALLOCATED" --, t.empty_blocks "BLOCKS EMPTY" --, (s.blocks-t.empty_blocks-1) "HIGH WATER MARK" from dba_tables t , dba_segments s where s.owner = t.owner and s.owner = :USERNAME and s.segment_name = t.table_name and s.tablespace_name = t.tablespace_name ) , idxseg as ( select s.owner , s.SEGMENT_TYPE , s.SEGMENT_NAME --, i.TABLE_NAME --, i.INDEX_NAME --, i.STATUS , i.LOGGING --, i.LEAF_BLOCKS --, i.BLEVEL , s.tablespace_name , i.LAST_ANALYZED , CASE WHEN i.NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM999.00') || ' T' WHEN i.NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM999.00') || ' B' WHEN i.NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000),2),'FM999.00') || ' M' WHEN i.NUM_ROWS >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.NUM_ROWS/1000,2),'FM999.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(i.NUM_ROWS,'FM999') || ' ' END NUM_ROWS , CASE WHEN i.sample_size >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.sample_size/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM999.00') || ' T' WHEN i.sample_size >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.sample_size/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM999.00') || ' B' WHEN i.sample_size >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.sample_size/(1000*1000),2),'FM999.00') || ' M' WHEN i.sample_size >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.sample_size/1000,2),'FM999.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(i.sample_size,'FM999') || ' ' END SAMPLE_SIZE -- , i.AVG_ROW_LEN , CASE WHEN i.INITIAL_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.INITIAL_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999.00') || ' TB' WHEN i.INITIAL_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.INITIAL_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999.00') || ' GB' WHEN i.INITIAL_EXTENT >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.INITIAL_EXTENT/(1024*1024),2),'FM999.00') || ' MB' WHEN i.INITIAL_EXTENT >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.INITIAL_EXTENT/1024,2),'FM999.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(i.INITIAL_EXTENT,'FM9990') || ' ' END INITIAL_EXTENT , CASE WHEN i.NEXT_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.NEXT_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999.00') || ' TB' WHEN i.NEXT_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.NEXT_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999.00') || ' GB' WHEN i.NEXT_EXTENT >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.NEXT_EXTENT/(1024*1024),2),'FM999.00') || ' MB' WHEN i.NEXT_EXTENT >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.NEXT_EXTENT/1024,2),'FM999.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(i.NEXT_EXTENT,'FM9990') || ' ' END NEXT_EXTENT , s.BLOCKS , s.EXTENTS , CASE WHEN s.BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999.00') || ' PB' WHEN s.BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999.00') || ' TB' WHEN s.BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999.00') || ' GB' WHEN s.BYTES >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/(1024*1024),2),'FM999.00') || ' MB' WHEN s.BYTES >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/1024,2),'FM999.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(s.BYTES,'FM9990') || ' ' END BYTES from dba_indexes i , dba_segments s where s.owner = i.owner AND s.owner = :USERNAME AND s.segment_name = i.index_name AND s.tablespace_name = i.tablespace_name AND s.segment_type = 'INDEX' ) ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ select * from ( select * from tabseg union select * from idxseg) order by segment_type, segment_name

and s.tablespace_name = t.tablespace_name and t.num_rows > 0 ) ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- select * from tabseg where owner = :USERNAME order by OWNER --, TABLESPACE_NAME --, SEGMENT_TYPE , TABLE_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select OWNER , CONSTRAINT_NAME , CASE WHEN CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'C' THEN 'CHECK' WHEN CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'P' THEN 'PRIMARY KEY' WHEN CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'U' THEN 'UNIQUE KEY' WHEN CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'R' THEN 'REFERENTIAL INTEGRITY' WHEN CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'V' THEN 'WITH CHECK OPTION ON A VIEW' WHEN CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'O' THEN 'WITH READ ONLY ON A VIEW' ELSE CONSTRAINT_TYPE END CONSTRAINT_TYPE , TABLE_NAME , SEARCH_CONDITION , R_OWNER , R_CONSTRAINT_NAME , DELETE_RULE , STATUS , DEFERRABLE , DEFERRED , VALIDATED , GENERATED , BAD , RELY , LAST_CHANGE , INDEX_OWNER , INDEX_NAME , INVALID , VIEW_RELATED from DBA_CONSTRAINTS WHERE OWNER = :USERNAME ORDER BY CONSTRAINT_TYPE

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select do.OWNER , do.OBJECT_NAME SEQUENCE_NAME , do.OBJECT_TYPE , do.CREATED , do.LAST_DDL_TIME , do.STATUS , ds.MIN_VALUE , ds.MAX_VALUE , ds.INCREMENT_BY , ds.CACHE_SIZE , ds.LAST_NUMBER , 'SELECT DBMS_METADATA.GET_DDL('||''''||OBJECT_TYPE||''''||','||''''||OBJECT_NAME||''''||','||''''||OWNER||''''||') FROM DUAL;' "GET DDL" from dba_objects do , dba_sequences ds where do.object_type = 'SEQUENCE' AND do.owner = :USERNAME AND do.OBJECT_NAME = ds.SEQUENCE_NAME order by owner , object_name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) with user_list as ( SELECT USERNAME , CREATED , ACCOUNT_STATUS , LOCK_DATE , EXPIRY_DATE , DEFAULT_TABLESPACE , TEMPORARY_TABLESPACE , PROFILE , INITIAL_RSRC_CONSUMER_GROUP , EXTERNAL_NAME , PASSWORD_VERSIONS --, AUTHENTICATION_TYPE --, LAST_LOGIN --, ORACLE_MAINTAINED FROM SYS.dba_users WHERE account_status LIKE '%OPEN%' and username not in ( 'APEX_030200' , 'ANONYMOUS' , 'APEX_040100' , 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' , 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' , 'SYSMAN' , 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' ) ORDER BY username , EXPIRY_DATE , LOCK_DATE) ------------------------------------------------------ select 'GRANT '|| listagg(GRANTED_ROLE, ', ') within group (order by grantee, GRANTED_ROLE) || ' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "ROLE PRIVILEGES" , 'REVOKE '||listagg(GRANTED_ROLE, ', ') within group (order by grantee, GRANTED_ROLE) || ' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from dba_role_privs where GRANTEE in (select USERNAME from user_list) group by GRANTEE , ADMIN_OPTION order by GRANTEE

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select GRANTEE , GRANTED_ROLE , ADMIN_OPTION , DEFAULT_ROLE from dba_role_privs where grantee = :USERNAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) /* DO NOT DELETE EVEN IF IT IS COMMENTED select 'GRANT '||GRANTED_ROLE||' to '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then 'WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "ROLE PRIVILEGES" from dba_role_privs where GRANTEE = :USERNAME order by GRANTED_ROLE */
select 'GRANT'|| SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(GRANTED_ROLE, ', '),2)|| ' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "ROLE PRIVILEGES" , 'REVOKE'||SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(GRANTED_ROLE, ', '),2)|| ' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from ( select GRANTEE , GRANTED_ROLE , ADMIN_OPTION , count(*) over (partition by GRANTEE) cnt , row_number () over (partition by GRANTEE order by grantee, GRANTED_ROLE) seq from dba_role_privs where GRANTEE = :USERNAME ) where seq = cnt start with seq = 1 connect by prior seq+1 = seq and prior GRANTEE = GRANTEE order by GRANTEE , GRANTED_ROLE

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select GRANTEE , PRIVILEGE , ADMIN_OPTION --, DEFAULT_ROLE from dba_SYS_privs where grantee = :USERNAME
/* select 'GRANT '||PRIVILEGE||' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "SYSTEM PRIVILEGES" , 'REVOKE '||PRIVILEGE||' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from dba_sys_privs where GRANTEE in (select GRANTEE from dba_role_privs where grantee = :USERNAME and DEFAULT_ROLE = 'YES') */

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select 'GRANT '||PRIVILEGE||' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "SYSTEM PRIVILEGES" , 'REVOKE '||PRIVILEGE||' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from dba_sys_privs where GRANTEE in (select GRANTEE from dba_role_privs where grantee = :USERNAME and DEFAULT_ROLE = 'YES')
--union all --select nvl(DBMS_METADATA.GET_GRANTED_DDL('SYSTEM_GRANT', :USERNAME), 'NULL') "DDL" from dual --union all --select nvl(DBMS_METADATA.GET_GRANTED_DDL('ROLE_GRANT', :USERNAME), 'NULL') "DDL" from dual --union all --select nvl(DBMS_METADATA.GET_GRANTED_DDL('OBJECT_GRANT', :USERNAME), 'NULL') "DDL" from dual

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select case when OBJECT_TYPE = 'TABLE' then 'DROP '|| OBJECT_TYPE||' '||OWNER||'.'||OBJECT_NAME||' CASCADE CONSTRAINTS PURGE;' when OBJECT_TYPE = 'JAVA CLASS' or OBJECT_TYPE = 'JAVA RESOURCE' or OBJECT_TYPE = 'JAVA SOURCE' then 'DROP '|| OBJECT_TYPE||' '||OWNER||'.'||'"'||OBJECT_NAME||'";' when OBJECT_TYPE = 'TYPE' then 'DROP '|| OBJECT_TYPE||' '||OWNER||'.'||OBJECT_NAME||' FORCE;' when OBJECT_TYPE = 'JOB' then 'EXECUTE DBMS_SCHEDULER.DROP_JOB('||''''||OBJECT_NAME||''''||');' when OBJECT_TYPE = 'JOB CLASS' then 'EXECUTE DBMS_SCHEDULER.DROP_JOB_CLASS('||''''||OBJECT_NAME||''''||');' else 'DROP '|| OBJECT_TYPE||' '||OWNER||'.'||OBJECT_NAME||';' end "DDL" FROM DBA_OBJECTS WHERE --object_type = :OBJECT_TYPE and OWNER IN (:USERNAME) and object_type not in ( 'PACKAGE BODY' , 'LOB' --, 'JOB' , 'INDEX' , 'INDEX PARTITION' , 'TABLE PARTITION' , 'TRIGGER' ) order by owner , object_type

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select DBMS_METADATA.GET_DDL('USER', :USERNAME)||';'||chr(13)||chr(10) "DDL" from dual

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select case when OBJECT_TYPE = 'TABLE' then 'DROP '|| OBJECT_TYPE||' '||OWNER||'.'||OBJECT_NAME||' CASCADE CONSTRAINTS PURGE;' when OBJECT_TYPE = 'JAVA CLASS' or OBJECT_TYPE = 'JAVA RESOURCE' or OBJECT_TYPE = 'JAVA SOURCE' then 'DROP '|| OBJECT_TYPE||' '||OWNER||'.'||'"'||OBJECT_NAME||'";' when OBJECT_TYPE = 'TYPE' then 'DROP '|| OBJECT_TYPE||' '||OWNER||'.'||OBJECT_NAME||' FORCE;' when OBJECT_TYPE = 'JOB' then 'EXECUTE DBMS_SCHEDULER.DROP_JOB('||''''||OBJECT_NAME||''''||');' when OBJECT_TYPE = 'JOB CLASS' then 'EXECUTE DBMS_SCHEDULER.DROP_JOB_CLASS('||''''||OBJECT_NAME||''''||');' else 'DROP '|| OBJECT_TYPE||' '||OWNER||'.'||OBJECT_NAME||';' end "DDL" FROM DBA_OBJECTS WHERE --object_type = :OBJECT_TYPE and OWNER IN (:USERNAME) and object_type not in ( 'PACKAGE BODY' , 'LOB' --, 'JOB' , 'INDEX' , 'INDEX PARTITION' , 'TABLE PARTITION' , 'TRIGGER' ) order by owner , object_type

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select GRANTEE , GRANTED_ROLE , ADMIN_OPTION , DEFAULT_ROLE from dba_role_privs where grantee = :USERNAME order by GRANTEE , GRANTED_ROLE

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) /* DO NOT DELETE EVEN IF IT IS COMMENTED select 'GRANT '||GRANTED_ROLE||' to '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then 'WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "ROLE PRIVILEGES" from dba_role_privs where GRANTEE = :USERNAME order by GRANTED_ROLE */
select 'GRANT'|| SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(GRANTED_ROLE, ', '),2)|| ' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "ROLE PRIVILEGES" , 'REVOKE'||SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(GRANTED_ROLE, ', '),2)|| ' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from ( select GRANTEE , GRANTED_ROLE , ADMIN_OPTION , count(*) over (partition by GRANTEE) cnt , row_number () over (partition by GRANTEE order by grantee, GRANTED_ROLE) seq from dba_role_privs where GRANTEE = :USERNAME ) where seq = cnt start with seq = 1 connect by prior seq+1 = seq and prior GRANTEE = GRANTEE order by GRANTEE , GRANTED_ROLE

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select GRANTEE , PRIVILEGE , ADMIN_OPTION --, DEFAULT_ROLE from dba_SYS_privs where grantee = :USERNAME order by GRANTEE , PRIVILEGE /* select 'GRANT '||PRIVILEGE||' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "SYSTEM PRIVILEGES" , 'REVOKE '||PRIVILEGE||' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from dba_sys_privs where GRANTEE in (select GRANTEE from dba_role_privs where grantee = :USERNAME and DEFAULT_ROLE = 'YES') */

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select 'GRANT '|| SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(PRIVILEGE, ','),2)|| ' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "SYS PRIVILEGES" , 'REVOKE'||SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(PRIVILEGE, ', '),2)|| ' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from ( select GRANTEE , PRIVILEGE , ADMIN_OPTION , count(*) over (partition by GRANTEE) cnt , row_number () over (partition by GRANTEE order by grantee, PRIVILEGE) seq from dba_sys_privs where grantee = :USERNAME ORDER BY grantee ) where seq = cnt start with seq = 1 connect by prior seq+1 = seq and prior GRANTEE = GRANTEE order by GRANTEE , PRIVILEGE /* select 'GRANT '||PRIVILEGE||' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "SYSTEM PRIVILEGES" , 'REVOKE '||PRIVILEGE||' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from dba_sys_privs where GRANTEE in (select GRANTEE from dba_role_privs where grantee = :USERNAME --and DEFAULT_ROLE = 'YES' ) */ --union all --select nvl(DBMS_METADATA.GET_GRANTED_DDL('SYSTEM_GRANT', :USERNAME), 'NULL') "DDL" from dual --union all --select nvl(DBMS_METADATA.GET_GRANTED_DDL('ROLE_GRANT', :USERNAME), 'NULL') "DDL" from dual --union all --select nvl(DBMS_METADATA.GET_GRANTED_DDL('OBJECT_GRANT', :USERNAME), 'NULL') "DDL" from dual

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) /* -- Below code can be used with Oracle Database Rlease 11gR2 and before (need to test with 10g/9i) select 'GRANT '|| SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(PRIVILEGE, ', '),2) ||' ON '||OWNER||'.'||TABLE_NAME||' TO '||GRANTEE||';' "TABLE GRANTS" , 'REOKE '|| SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(PRIVILEGE, ', '),2) ||' ON '||OWNER||'.'||TABLE_NAME||' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from ( select GRANTEE , OWNER , TABLE_NAME , PRIVILEGE , count(*) over (partition by GRANTEE, TABLE_NAME) cnt , row_number () over (partition by GRANTEE, TABLE_NAME order by GRANTEE, TABLE_NAME, privilege) seq from dba_tab_privs where OWNER = :USERNAME order by OWNER , TABLE_NAME , PRIVILEGE) where seq = cnt start with seq = 1 connect by prior seq+1 = seq and prior TABLE_NAME = TABLE_NAME AND GRANTEE = GRANTEE order by PRIVILEGE , TABLE_NAME , GRANTEE */ -- LISTAGG analytical function works only with Oracle 11gR2 and later. select 'GRANT '|| listagg(PRIVILEGE, ', ') within group (order by OWNER, TABLE_NAME, GRANTEE) ||' ON '||OWNER||'.'||TABLE_NAME||' TO '||GRANTEE||';' "TABLE GRANTS" , 'REVOKE '|| listagg(PRIVILEGE, ', ') within group (order by OWNER, TABLE_NAME, GRANTEE) ||' ON '||OWNER||'.'||TABLE_NAME||' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from dba_tab_privs where OWNER = :USERNAME group by OWNER , TABLE_NAME , GRANTEE order by OWNER , TABLE_NAME , GRANTEE

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select 'GRANT'|| SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(GRANTED_ROLE, ', '),2)|| ' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "ROLE PRIVILEGES" --, 'REVOKE'||SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(GRANTED_ROLE, ', '),2)|| ' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from ( select GRANTEE , GRANTED_ROLE , ADMIN_OPTION , count(*) over (partition by GRANTEE) cnt , row_number () over (partition by GRANTEE order by grantee, GRANTED_ROLE) seq from dba_role_privs where grantee in ( select username from dba_users where account_status = 'OPEN' and username not in ( 'APEX_030200' , 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' , 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' , 'SYSMAN' , 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' ) ) ORDER BY grantee ) where seq = cnt start with seq = 1 connect by prior seq+1 = seq and prior GRANTEE = GRANTEE order by GRANTEE , GRANTED_ROLE

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select 'GRANT '|| SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(PRIVILEGE, ','),2)|| ' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "SYS PRIVILEGES" --, 'REVOKE'||SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(GRANTED_ROLE, ', '),2)|| ' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from ( select GRANTEE , PRIVILEGE , ADMIN_OPTION , count(*) over (partition by GRANTEE) cnt , row_number () over (partition by GRANTEE order by grantee, PRIVILEGE) seq from dba_sys_privs where grantee in ( select username from dba_users where account_status = 'OPEN' and username not in ( 'APEX_030200' , 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' , 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' , 'SYSMAN' , 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' ) ) ORDER BY grantee ) where seq = cnt start with seq = 1 connect by prior seq+1 = seq and prior GRANTEE = GRANTEE order by GRANTEE , PRIVILEGE

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select case when OBJECT_TYPE = 'TABLE' then 'DROP '|| OBJECT_TYPE||' '||OWNER||'.'||OBJECT_NAME||' CASCADE CONSTRAINTS PURGE;' when OBJECT_TYPE = 'JAVA CLASS' or OBJECT_TYPE = 'JAVA RESOURCE' or OBJECT_TYPE = 'JAVA SOURCE' then 'DROP '|| OBJECT_TYPE||' '||OWNER||'.'||'"'||OBJECT_NAME||'";' when OBJECT_TYPE = 'TYPE' then 'DROP '|| OBJECT_TYPE||' '||OWNER||'.'||OBJECT_NAME||' FORCE;' when OBJECT_TYPE = 'JOB' then 'EXECUTE DBMS_SCHEDULER.DROP_JOB('||''''||OBJECT_NAME||''''||');' when OBJECT_TYPE = 'JOB CLASS' then 'EXECUTE DBMS_SCHEDULER.DROP_JOB_CLASS('||''''||OBJECT_NAME||''''||');' else 'DROP '|| OBJECT_TYPE||' '||OWNER||'.'||OBJECT_NAME||';' end "DDL" FROM DBA_OBJECTS WHERE --object_type = :OBJECT_TYPE and OWNER IN (:USERNAME) and object_type not in ( 'PACKAGE BODY' , 'LOB' --, 'JOB' , 'INDEX' , 'INDEX PARTITION' , 'TABLE PARTITION' , 'TRIGGER' ) order by owner , object_type

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) with tabseg as ( select s.owner , s.SEGMENT_TYPE , s.SEGMENT_NAME --, t.TABLE_NAME , t.logging , s.tablespace_name , t.LAST_ANALYZED , CASE WHEN t.NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM9000.00') || ' T' WHEN t.NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM9000.00') || ' B' WHEN t.NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000),2),'FM9000.00') || ' M' WHEN t.NUM_ROWS >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.NUM_ROWS/1000,2),'FM9000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(t.NUM_ROWS,'FM9000') || ' ' END NUM_ROWS , CASE WHEN t.sample_size >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.sample_size/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM9000.00') || ' T' WHEN t.sample_size >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.sample_size/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM9000.00') || ' B' WHEN t.sample_size >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.sample_size/(1000*1000),2),'FM9000.00') || ' M' WHEN t.sample_size >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.sample_size/1000,2),'FM9000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(t.sample_size,'FM9000') || ' ' END SAMPLE_SIZE --, t.AVG_ROW_LEN , CASE WHEN t.INITIAL_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.INITIAL_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN t.INITIAL_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.INITIAL_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN t.INITIAL_EXTENT >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.INITIAL_EXTENT/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN t.INITIAL_EXTENT >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.INITIAL_EXTENT/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(t.INITIAL_EXTENT,'FM9000') || ' ' END INITIAL_EXTENT , CASE WHEN t.NEXT_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.NEXT_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN t.NEXT_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.NEXT_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN t.NEXT_EXTENT >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.NEXT_EXTENT/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN t.NEXT_EXTENT >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.NEXT_EXTENT/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(t.NEXT_EXTENT,'FM9000') || ' ' END NEXT_EXTENT , t.blocks "BLOCKS USED" , s.EXTENTS , CASE WHEN s.BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' PB' WHEN s.BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN s.BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN s.BYTES >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN s.BYTES >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(s.BYTES,'FM9000') || ' ' END BYTES --, s.blocks "BLOCKS ALLOCATED" --, t.empty_blocks "BLOCKS EMPTY" --, (s.blocks-t.empty_blocks-1) "HIGH WATER MARK" from dba_tables t , dba_segments s where s.owner = t.owner and s.owner = :USERNAME and s.segment_name = t.table_name and s.tablespace_name = t.tablespace_name ) , idxseg as ( select s.owner , s.SEGMENT_TYPE , s.SEGMENT_NAME --, i.TABLE_NAME --, i.INDEX_NAME --, i.STATUS , i.LOGGING --, i.LEAF_BLOCKS --, i.BLEVEL , s.tablespace_name , i.LAST_ANALYZED , CASE WHEN i.NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM999.00') || ' T' WHEN i.NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM999.00') || ' B' WHEN i.NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000),2),'FM999.00') || ' M' WHEN i.NUM_ROWS >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.NUM_ROWS/1000,2),'FM999.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(i.NUM_ROWS,'FM999') || ' ' END NUM_ROWS , CASE WHEN i.sample_size >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.sample_size/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM999.00') || ' T' WHEN i.sample_size >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.sample_size/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM999.00') || ' B' WHEN i.sample_size >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.sample_size/(1000*1000),2),'FM999.00') || ' M' WHEN i.sample_size >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.sample_size/1000,2),'FM999.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(i.sample_size,'FM999') || ' ' END SAMPLE_SIZE -- , i.AVG_ROW_LEN , CASE WHEN i.INITIAL_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.INITIAL_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999.00') || ' TB' WHEN i.INITIAL_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.INITIAL_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999.00') || ' GB' WHEN i.INITIAL_EXTENT >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.INITIAL_EXTENT/(1024*1024),2),'FM999.00') || ' MB' WHEN i.INITIAL_EXTENT >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.INITIAL_EXTENT/1024,2),'FM999.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(i.INITIAL_EXTENT,'FM9990') || ' ' END INITIAL_EXTENT , CASE WHEN i.NEXT_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.NEXT_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999.00') || ' TB' WHEN i.NEXT_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.NEXT_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999.00') || ' GB' WHEN i.NEXT_EXTENT >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.NEXT_EXTENT/(1024*1024),2),'FM999.00') || ' MB' WHEN i.NEXT_EXTENT >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(i.NEXT_EXTENT/1024,2),'FM999.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(i.NEXT_EXTENT,'FM9990') || ' ' END NEXT_EXTENT , s.BLOCKS , s.EXTENTS , CASE WHEN s.BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999.00') || ' PB' WHEN s.BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999.00') || ' TB' WHEN s.BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999.00') || ' GB' WHEN s.BYTES >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/(1024*1024),2),'FM999.00') || ' MB' WHEN s.BYTES >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/1024,2),'FM999.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(s.BYTES,'FM9990') || ' ' END BYTES from dba_indexes i , dba_segments s where s.owner = i.owner AND s.owner = :USERNAME AND s.segment_name = i.index_name AND s.tablespace_name = i.tablespace_name AND s.segment_type = 'INDEX' ) TO_CHAR(INITIAL_EXTENT,'FM9000') || ' ' END INITIAL_EXTENT , CASE WHEN NEXT_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(NEXT_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN NEXT_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(NEXT_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN NEXT_EXTENT >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(NEXT_EXTENT/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN NEXT_EXTENT >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(NEXT_EXTENT/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(NEXT_EXTENT,'FM9000') || ' ' END NEXT_EXTENT , EXTENTS , CASE WHEN BYTES >= --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select s.OWNER , s.TABLESPACE_NAME , s.segment_type , l.TABLE_NAME , l.SEGMENT_NAME , l.COLUMN_NAME , l.INDEX_NAME , CASE WHEN s.BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN s.BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN s.BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN s.BYTES >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN s.BYTES >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(s.BYTES,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END BYTES FROM dba_segments s , dba_lobs l WHERE s.segment_name = l.segment_name and s.OWNER = :USERNAME ORDER BY s.OWNER , s.TABLESPACE_NAME , s.segment_type , l.TABLE_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) with user_list as (SELECT USERNAME , CREATED , ACCOUNT_STATUS , LOCK_DATE , EXPIRY_DATE , DEFAULT_TABLESPACE , TEMPORARY_TABLESPACE , PROFILE , INITIAL_RSRC_CONSUMER_GROUP , EXTERNAL_NAME , PASSWORD_VERSIONS --, AUTHENTICATION_TYPE --, LAST_LOGIN --, ORACLE_MAINTAINED FROM SYS.dba_users WHERE account_status LIKE 'EXPIRED%' and username not in ( 'APEX_030200' , 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' , 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' , 'SYSMAN' , 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' ) ORDER BY username , EXPIRY_DATE , LOCK_DATE ) ------------------------------------------- select 'GRANT'|| SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(GRANTED_ROLE, ', '),2)|| ' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "ROLE PRIVILEGES" , 'REVOKE'||SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(GRANTED_ROLE, ', '),2)|| ' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from ( select GRANTEE , GRANTED_ROLE , ADMIN_OPTION , count(*) over (partition by GRANTEE) cnt , row_number () over (partition by GRANTEE order by grantee, GRANTED_ROLE) seq from dba_role_privs where GRANTEE in (select USERNAME from user_list) ) where seq = cnt start with seq = 1 connect by prior seq+1 = seq and prior GRANTEE = GRANTEE order by GRANTEE , GRANTED_ROLE

'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' , 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'PUBLIC' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' , 'SYSMAN' , 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' ---- 12c ---- , 'AUDSYS' , 'DBSFWUSER' , 'GSMADMIN_INTERNAL' , 'REMOTE_SCHEDULER_AGENT' ) group by owner order by owner ) , user_list as ( SELECT USERNAME , CREATED , ACCOUNT_STATUS , LOCK_DATE , EXPIRY_DATE , DEFAULT_TABLESPACE , TEMPORARY_TABLESPACE , PROFILE , INITIAL_RSRC_CONSUMER_GROUP , EXTERNAL_NAME , PASSWORD_VERSIONS , AUTHENTICATION_TYPE , LAST_LOGIN , ORACLE_MAINTAINED FROM SYS.dba_users WHERE account_status LIKE '%OPEN%' and username not in ( 'APEX_030200' , 'ANONYMOUS' , 'APEX_040100' , 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' , 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' , 'SYSMAN' , 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' ) AND ( username not in (select owner from nonschema_users)) ORDER BY username , EXPIRY_DATE , LOCK_DATE) ------------------------------------------------------ select 'GRANT '|| listagg(PRIVILEGE, ', ') within group (order by grantee, PRIVILEGE) || ' TO '||GRANTEE|| case when ADMIN_OPTION = 'YES' then ' WITH ADMIN OPTION;' else ';' end "ROLE PRIVILEGES" , 'REVOKE '||listagg(PRIVILEGE, ', ') within group (order by grantee, PRIVILEGE) || ' FROM '||GRANTEE||';' "REVOKE GRANTS" from dba_sys_privs --GRANTEE = :USERNAME where GRANTEE in ( select GRANTEE from dba_role_privs where grantee in (select USERNAME from user_list) and DEFAULT_ROLE = 'YES' ) group by GRANTEE , ADMIN_OPTION order by GRANTEE

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select NAME , INSTANCE_NUMBER INST_ID , OS_USERNAME , USERNAME , ACTION_NAME , USERHOST , RETURNCODE , TERMINAL , TIMESTAMP /* --, OWNER --, OBJ_NAME --, OBJ_EDITION_NAME , ACTION --, NEW_OWNER --, NEW_NAME --, OBJ_PRIVILEGE --, SYS_PRIVILEGE --, ADMIN_OPTION --, GRANTEE --, AUDIT_OPTION , SES_ACTIONS , LOGOFF_TIME , LOGOFF_LREAD , LOGOFF_PREAD , LOGOFF_LWRITE , LOGOFF_DLOCK */ , COMMENT_TEXT , SESSIONID , ENTRYID , STATEMENTID --, PRIV_USED --, CLIENT_ID --, ECONTEXT_ID --, SESSION_CPU --, EXTENDED_TIMESTAMP --, PROXY_SESSIONID --, GLOBAL_UID , OS_PROCESS , TRANSACTIONID --, SCN --, SQL_BIND , SQL_TEXT --, RLS_INFO --, CURRENT_USER from dba_audit_trail dat , v$database d where d.dbid = dat.dbid AND --timestamp BETWEEN (sysdate-30/1440) AND (sysdate) AND --timestamp BETWEEN (sysdate-60/1440) AND (sysdate) AND --USERNAME IN ('SYSADM') USERNAME NOT IN ('SYSTEM', 'SYS', 'DBSNMP') --AND --RETURNCODE <> 0 order by to_char(timestamp,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM') desc

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2019/02/13 (of last update/validation) --select 'WORK IN PROGRESS' from dual SELECT NAME , DBUSERNAME , ACTION_NAME , RETURN_CODE , EVENT_TIMESTAMP , UNIFIED_AUDIT_POLICIES , CLIENT_PROGRAM_NAME --, CLIENT_IDENTIFIER , USERHOST , SESSIONID FROM UNIFIED_AUDIT_TRAIL uat , v$DATABASE D WHERE uat.DBID = D.DBID AND --DBUSERNAME in ('CFSE2490', 'PATHOLOGY','BMI_ADMIN') --AND DBUSERNAME not in ('SYS', 'SYSTEM', 'DBSNMP') AND uat.EVENT_TIMESTAMP > (sysdate - 120) --AND --uat.RETURN_CODE <> 0 ORDER BY EVENT_TIMESTAMP DESC

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select NAME , INSTANCE_NUMBER INST_ID , DB_USER , OS_USER , USERHOST , SESSION_ID , TIMESTAMP --, CLIENT_ID --, ECONTEXT_ID --, EXT_NAME , OBJECT_SCHEMA , OBJECT_NAME , POLICY_NAME , SCN , SQL_TEXT --, SQL_BIND --, COMMENT$TEXT , STATEMENT_TYPE --, EXTENDED_TIMESTAMP --, PROXY_SESSIONID --, GLOBAL_UID , OS_PROCESS , TRANSACTIONID , STATEMENTID , ENTRYID --, OBJ_EDITION_NAME --, RLS_INFO --, CURRENT_USER from dba_fga_audit_trail fat , v$database d where d.dbid = fat.dbid AND db_user not IN ('SYS', 'SYSTEM', 'DBSNMP') AND TIMESTAMP between trunc(sysdate-1) and (sysdate) order by TIMESTAMP desc
